# {{lb|zh|Taiwan}} a [[caretaker]]; an [[in-house nurse]]; a job to take care of a disabled person's eating, moving, bathing, etc.

===Usage notes===
* In Taiwan, the certificate required to be a nurse is higher than that required to be a "in-house nurse"
